gems.name: aspose_cells_cloud
gems.info: Ruby Cloud SDK wraps Aspose.Cells REST API so you could seamlessly integrate Microsoft ExcelÂ® spreadsheet generation, manipulation, conversion & inspection features into your own applications. Aspose.Cells Cloud for Ruby enables you to handle various aspects of Excel files, including cell data, styles, formulas, charts, pivot tables, data validation, comments, drawing objects, images, hyperlinks, and so on. Additionally, it supports operations such as splitting, merging, repairing, and converting to other compatible file formats.

metadata.keywords: excel, spreadsheet, convert, xlsx, pdf, json, cloud, rest api ,merge, split, protect
